H3.text: what is the longest pier in the uk. Southend Pier

A4.text: Extending 1.33 miles (2.14 km) into the Thames Estuary, it is the longest pleasure pier in the world.

A5.text: By 1848, it was the longest pier in Europe at 2,100 metres (7,000 ft).
